resources.string: Would you like to try some experimental dishes? Only by the table in our kitchen you can try prepare yourself an oatmeal with celery or pesto sandwich soaked in cacao. Just grab what you see and mix it!

You can scream there as loud as you can. At least until the neighbors ask for some quiet. When the weather is good there is a possibility to make a water party in a bathtub. There is a possibility to climb a wall, but not recommended.
It’s hypnotising. And you can put some stuff in and out.
This cool sound of flush! And saying bye bye to different things that float away so fast before the parents come.
Mysterious and rarely inaccessible. With a lot of cool stuff inside.
In our climate it’s common to have some spiders at home. If you don’t want to clean your house every day, you will have at least some ready-to-use decorations for Halloween.
We like to keeping them and looking at them, but we are still forgetting about watering. So you could help us eventually - we provide metal or plastic watering can and a lot of fun.
There is a possibility to observe many birds, even predatory. On the other hand you can see not-so-wild parkin lot as well.

We have basil, thyme and oregano at our window sill and same problem as with the balcony plants - our herbs always need more water! We provides some cooking workshops with spreading some leaves (that is the kids’ task) and collecting them (your turn).

In our carpets and under our beds is robust world of little creatures to observe. It consist of mites mostly. Vacuuming helps to get rid of them, but since our vacuum cleaner provides such a fun, efficiency of cleaning dramatically decreased.
Not leaving parents in the bathroom alone
Looking for something small you’ve lost? We know where to find it!

Espresso, french press or drip? Our almost-three-year-old will prepare everything you need. With a little help of parents and with a lot of coffee around (but that’s really cool!)… and after the nihgt with us you will surely need it!
The bathroom will never be a quiet place again. And your principal right to poop alone is not respected any more.
The darkest colors of ice cream taste the best.

That is the question. You can refuse to bath when the water is ready and ask for some water-coloring powder when there is nothing like that at home. You can use the bath at the balcony when the weather is good (it means there is more as 4 Celsius degrees outside).

Kitchen may not be very surprising, but the kitchen floor could be. And why the kitchen floor exactly? There is a possibility to find some old bread or an apple purchased one month before. Guten Apetit!
We recommend some indirect investigations. Under the pillows you can find some crumbles etc., which are a pretty good material for a long what-have-you-eaten-recently-quiz.

There is a possibility to use the bike and the kids’ cargo as well. After some routes with additional (sweet) 30 kg to pull behind, you will feel like a profesionall cyclist every time you ride a bike alone.
Can be for two as well - it’s only about motivation
Healthy legs are really useful, especially when you need to quickly catch a toddler.
Option for the youngest - others are allowed to crawl as well, but it’s rather not convenient.
It means Leons bed. Rarely used, but design.
Always the most occupied option. Theoretically reservations are obligatory, but If you just think that there is not enough space, remove dad by screaming (he will move to sofa).
You just need to be tired enough.
